definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: Buy some gun oil and lube up your paintball gun on a regular basis.
sentences.chinese: 買漆彈槍潤滑油並且週期的替你的槍上油。

sentences.english: Move around in paintball without enemy seeing you.
sentences.chinese: 中移動沒有敵人看到你在漆彈。
